document.full_text: more than 500 people have been killed by twisters in 2011, making it the deadliest tornado year in the united states since 1953, according to the national weather service.
document.title: 2011 tornado death toll tops 500 and season not over
lines_and_colors: more than 500 people have been killed by twisters in 2011, making it the deadliest tornado year in the united states since 1953, according to the national weather service.
